name: No Man's Land
overview: 1991 saw the release of fun little multiplayer Shooter game called No Man's Land on the Amiga systems, created and published by Oxygen for free as a Public Domain. The object of the game is to kill the other player and win. Simple! The game consists of eight different levels where you can play. On each of these levels lies 15 capsules. Each one of the capsules can hold one of seven different weapons or bonus objects which can be used within the arena. Multiplayer only.
